name: Yoga inspired twist necklace in sterling silver
description: Designed to resemble a prayer wheel that spins, you'll find these simple yoga inspired, spirit infused necklaces, a wonderful addition to your jewelry box. Each handcrafted sterling silver bead, is just about 1.5 inches long, and is continuously stamped with a favorite phrase or mantra. It spins freely on it's chain, and is available on a 16", 18" or 24" sterling silver chain (select chain length from drop down menu). Pick your favorite: |*| OM |*| I AM |*| NAMASTE |*| INSPIRE |*| BREATHE |*| BALANCE |*| WAHE GURU |*| SAT NAM |*| CUSTOMIZE/PERSONALIZE Visit our main site to purchase a personalized version of this necklace. We love that the copper and silver combo will develop a wonderful patina with age, that will add to the unique design of this piece. For more yoga inspired pieces visit us on our main page Inspired by Janet Setter Jewelry. Namaste!
